entities.description: Item related to the truthfulness of statements about smoking behavior.
Item related to craving for cigarettes.
Item related to grouping with other cigarette users.
Item related to avoidance behavior in relation to smoking.
Item related to planning smoking activities.
Item related to not smoking.
Item related to regular cigarette usage.
Item related to weekly cigarette usage.
Item related to naming regular cigarette brands or types.
Item related to not being influenced in smoking decisions.
Item related to increased cigarette usage.
Item related to satisfaction derived from smoking.
Item related to the overall measurement of cigarette usage.
Reverse coded item related to control over smoking.
Reverse coded item related to changes in cigarette usage.
Reverse coded item related to the severity of loss of habit for smoking.
Reverse coded item related to the influence of smoking behavior.
Nicotine dependence score based on the NDSS.
Nicotine dependence classification based on NDSS score.
Fagerstrom Test of Nicotine Dependence.
Nicotine dependence score based on FTND.
Item related to smoking within 30 minutes of waking.

relationships.description: Relates NDSS to its corresponding nicotine dependence score.
Classifies the nicotine dependence based on NDSS score.
NDSS contains item CIGIRTBL related to truthfulness in smoking behavior.
NDSS contains item CIGCRAVE related to cigarette cravings.
NDSS contains item CIGCRAGP related to grouping with other smokers.
NDSS contains item CIGAVOID related to avoidance behaviors in smoking.
NDSS contains item CIGPLANE related to planning smoking activities.
NDSS contains item CIGNOUT related to not smoking.
NDSS contains item CIGREGDY related to regular cigarette usage.
NDSS contains item CIGREGWK related to weekly cigarette usage.
NDSS contains item CIGREGNM related to naming regular cigarette brands.
NDSS contains item related to not being influenced in smoking decisions.
NDSS contains item related to increased cigarette usage.
NDSS contains item CIGSATIS related to smoking satisfaction.
NDSS contains item CIGLOTMR related to overall cigarette usage.
NDSS contains reverse coded item CIGNCTL.
NDSS contains reverse coded item CIGNMCHG.
NDSS contains reverse coded item CIGSVLHR.
NDSS contains reverse coded item CIGINFLU.
Relates FTND to its corresponding nicotine dependence score.
FTND examines how soon after waking the respondent smokes.
